title: The Happy Puzzle Company - The Genius Square - 62,208 Puzzle Challenges for Friends and Family Board Game Night - Logic STEM Educational Learning Resources (The Genius Square)
features: ENDLESS FUN - The Genius Square has over 62,000 puzzles to explore, the fun never has to end! The Genius Square is ranked one of the top board games for children and adults! If you love problem-solving games like the Rubik's cube, then you'll love the Genius Square even more! A genius, mastermind, smart puzzle game that is a great learning resource and extremely fun to play

ROLL THE DICE & RACE YOUR OPPONENT TO COMPLETE THE SQUARE! - Each player receives a Genius Square grid (two are included) and a set of nine coloured shapes, plus seven ‘blocker’ pieces. Roll all seven of the dice together and place a ‘blocker’ piece into the squares matching the seven co-ordinates that appear on the dice. Now race your opponent to fill every other space on the grid using the nine shapes.

SOLO OR HEAD-TO-HEAD - Play solo, or race an opponent to beat the grid! Do you have competitive friends or family? Go head to head on your next family game night or practice on your own to improve your skills, as this game can be played as a single player too!

EDUCATIONAL BENEFITS - The Happy Puzzle Company STEM games are designed to enhance hand-eye coordination, manipulative skills, logical thinking and problem-solving ability. In addition, the game improves visual perception, spatial awareness, sequencing, strategic planning and speed of thought, whilst building self-confidence and resilience. The Genius Square is an excellent game for helping with dyspraxia, dyslexia & ADHD.
GREAT FOR AGES 6 to Adult - This Happy Puzzle Company game is great for ages 6+ and a great gift for birthdays, Christmas, sats & gcse revision activities, school holidays and weekends.
description: From the manufacturer The Genius Square is an award winning and well-made puzzle game that you will become addicted to! Happy Puzzle Company Game of the Year 2018/19 nominee Each puzzle can be solved from the 62,208 possible solutions Play solo, or race an opponent to fill the grid Using a specially devised computer program, it is confirmed that all of the combinations have at least one possible solution, some have multiple solutions! This table game is well-designed and includes grids, dice, blockers, and 9 different shapes with different colors. Easy to travel with and simply have fun STEM board game that promotes problem solving, spatial awareness, and motor manipulation skill training How to Play: Roll all seven dice together Each player places the 7 blockers into the squares of each grid to match the seven co-ordinates that appear on the dice RACE TIME! Each player will fill the 9 colored shapes into every other space on the grid to against the opponent Whoever finishes first is the winner! Also available for 1 player. You can play alone and challenge yourself against the clock, or find out more solutions! The box includes: Grid 2X 7 Dice 1X 7 Blocker 2X 9 Colored shape 2X Note: Not suitable for children under 3 years old due to small parts Recommended Ages: 6+ The Genius Square - One/Two Player Board Game You Will Be Addicted 60, 000+ Possible Solutions Play Solo, or Play Duo Happy Puzzle Company 2018/19 Game of the Year Nominee STEM Puzzle Game For Kids and Adults; The New Board Game For Families The Genius Square The Genius Star Bee Genius Add To Basket Add To Basket Add To Basket Customer Reviews 4.8 out of 5 stars 6,949 4.8 out of 5 stars 2,227 4.7 out of 5 stars 308 Price £19.99 £ 19 . 99 £19.99 £ 19 . 99 £19.99 £ 19 . 99 Age 6+ 8+ 3+ Player 1 - 2 1 - 2 1 How To Play The Genius Square? Easy to Learn! There are 7 dice printed with the combinations of letter A to E and number 1 to 6. Roll the 7 dice at the same time. How To Play The Genius Square? Easy to Learn! Either play solo or duo, follow the letters and numbers on the dice, and place the 7 blockers on the grid. How To Play The Genius Square? Easy to Learn! RACE TIME! 1 Player: Challenge yourself to against the clock! How fast is your best score?! 2 Player: Against your opponent... whoever finishes first is the winner! Roll the Dice Place the Blockers on the Grid Fit the shapes on the Grid
